name: Jill Larson
biography: Jill Larson was born on October 7, 1947 in Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA. She is an actress, known for All My Children (1970), The Taking of Deborah Logan (2014) and Shutter Island (2010).::Anonymous
trivia: Adopted a baby daughter, Anni-Ming, in June of 1996, from China.
She was nominated for a Student Academy Award for producing the documentary film "Gibbs Garden" about a painter living with AIDS. His work was later exhibited which was co-curated by Larson.
Her niece and nephew are from Korea.
filmography: Taking Your Bra Off in 49 Days ()
The Day the Women Got Even
